summary: A simple spreadsheet with pictures, descriptions, and requirements of the girls you can marry. (Info/pics were taken from elderscrolls.wikia - this just organizes and puts them all together in a spreadsheet).
descriptionHtml:
A simple spreadsheet with pictures, descriptions, and requirements of the girls you can marry. (Info/pics were taken from elderscrolls.wikia - this just organizes and puts them all together in a spreadsheet). Certainly not a \"mod\", just makes things easy if you\'re looking to \"choose\" a wife.

It has the 27 girls, and should be able to click on their name to go to the wikia to read more about them if you\'d like. 

**** NOTE : If you check the USERS pictures, Gamester565 was cool enough to screenshot the spreadsheet & make it a .jpg. So, if you don\'t want to view it in spreadsheet, it\'s still available. The spreadsheet is a bit bigger, and probably easier to read - but this is very helpful. Thanks Gamester !

Let me know if the list is incomplete, that\'s all I found.

All wives are able to open up a shop, and all shops generate daily gold.

Added :
New file adds info regarding whether or not the potential bride can be a follower or offers any training.
author: Dolic
